# Cold Snap (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Cold Spells|cold]]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 1 mile

**Area:** 1-mile-radius circle centered on you

**Duration:** 2d4 hours

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 50

*As you call upon divine power to fuel your spell, you feel the air around you become chilled. The drop in temperature creates a thin fog that exacerbates the cold in the air without hindering your vision or movement whatsoever.*

This spell causes a powerful cold front to form, lowering the temperature in the affected area by 5 degrees Fahrenheit per caster level (maximum change of 50 degrees Fahrenheit), to a maximum low of â€“20 degrees Fahrenheit (see Cold Dangers, *DMG* 302). Spells with the cold descriptor deal an extra 1 point of damage per die when cast in the area.
